authorblurb.para: Paul is most interested in applications that run on top of Phoenix. As such he constantly trawls the internet look for suitable server applications for Pheonix. He tries to persuade the authors to rebase to Phoenix or make their apps phoenix compatible.
Paul wrote some of blocks for Cornerstone and some of the apps in Avalon apps. He also started AvalonDB, Jesktop, Excalibur-AltRMI and Enterprise Object Broker.
